content.webTitle: Your pictures: share your photos on the theme of 'numbers'

fields.headline: Your pictures: share your photos on the theme of 'numbers'
fields.bodyText: We’re now running a regular photography assignment in the Observer New Review, with a selection of your images published each week, and the next theme is ‘numbers.’ We know we can count on you to interpret the theme in innumerable ways – when you share your photos do tell us about them in the description box. The closing date is Thursday 18 February at 10 am. We’ll publish our favourites in The New Review on Sunday 21 February and in a gallery on the Guardian site. You can share your ‘numbers’ pictures by clicking on the blue ‘Contribute’ button on this article. You can also use the Guardian app and search for ‘GuardianWitness assignments’ – and if you add it to the homepage – you can keep up with all our assignments. GuardianWitness is the home of readers’ content on the Guardian. Contribute your video, pictures and stories, and browse news, reviews and creations submitted by others.
